Token.Abstract: * The property key to use when performing a comparison
* The property key to use when performing a comparison
* The property to indicate whether the comparison should be performed in ascending mode
* The property to indicate whether the comparison should be performed in ascending mode
Creates and returns an sort descriptor with the specified key and ordering.

Parameter.Name: ascending
Parameter.Abstract: YES if the sort descriptor specifies sorting in ascending order, otherwise NO.

Parameter.Name: theKey
Parameter.Abstract: the property key to use when performing a comparison. Must not be nil or empty.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A sort descriptor initialized with the specified key and ordering.

Token.Abstract: Initializes a newly allocated sort descriptor with the specified key and ordering.

Parameter.Name: ascending
Parameter.Abstract: YES if the sort descriptor specifies sorting in ascending order, otherwise NO.

Parameter.Name: theKey
Parameter.Abstract: the property key to use when performing a comparison. Must not be nil or empty.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A sort descriptor initialized with the specified key and ordering.

Token.Abstract: Returns a string representation of the sort.
Returns a JSON representation of the sort.
